name: Herding Ghosts
description:
Herd ghosts into the light with the help of your ghost-herding cat! Save as many as you can. But be careful of the demons. They're full of tricks. 

Submission for the 52nd Godot Wild Jam

  • Theme: Ghosts - You herd ghosts. There are a lot of ghosts.

KNOWN BUGS 🐛

This game was finished on a 5-hour red-eye flight , so let me know when you find cRaZy BuGs:

TEAM 👾

Just this spooky Kooky.

OTHER CREDITS:

Font: Carrotflower

Audio: Prelude from Prelude and Fugue in A minor, BWV 543, by Johann Sebastian Bach (courtesy of WikiCommons)
